item.title: About Joint Insights
item.description: Why? It is the mission of Joint Insights to help people leverage different perspectives and new approaches to make sense of their situation and solve the challenges they are facing. How? Nourish transparency The brutal truth puts us on the same page, and is most effective on moving us together in the same direction. Keep flowing Once you solve one problem, you expose the next one. Embrace that, and constantly seek to find out what the root issue is.

item.title: Events
item.description: Upcoming Events! (function(funcName, baseObj) { funcName = funcName || "docReady"; baseObj = baseObj || window; var readyList = []; var readyFired = false; var readyEventHandlersInstalled = false; function ready() { if (!readyFired) { readyFired = true; for (var i = 0; i Loading events, please stand by..."); $.get('https://www.eventbriteapi.com/v3/events/search/?token='+token+'&organizer.id='+organizer+'&expand=venue,ticket_classes', function(res) { if(res.events.length) { $events.html(""); var sortedEvents = res.events.sort(function(a,b) { var aDate = new Date(a.start.utc); var bDate = new Date(b.start.utc); return aDate bDate; }); for(var i=0;i"
